Package org.openwms.core.preferences.impl.mongodb

Class MongoPreferencePersistenceAdapter

java.lang.Object
org.openwms.core.preferences.impl.mongodb.MongoPreferencePersistenceAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
PreferencePersistencePort
@Profile("MONGODB") @Component class MongoPreferencePersistenceAdapter extends Object implements PreferencePersistencePort
A MongoPreferencePersistenceAdapter implements PreferencePersistencePort using MongoDB.
Author:
Heiko Scherrer
